data.title: Events ‚Äî Zin Yoga & Wine
data.text:
Live Music with Courtney Slocum & Bill Crook of The Red Clefs

Our awesome and super talented friends are BACK at the wine lounge!! About the band:

Courtney Slocum and Bill Crook have been musical co-conspirators since 2018. First brought together in a classic rock cover band, they quickly realized they had a mutual interest in both classic hits and current pop songs. With Courtney‚Äôs angelic vocals and jazzy piano lines and Bill‚Äôs driving guitar rhythms they cover popular music from the 70‚Äôs to today. They are sure to play a selection of hits that will put a smile on your face and have you singing along!

View Event ‚Üí

Zin's Open Mic hosted by Kate Bopp!!

Dust off your instrument and come on out for your time to shine!

About the event: 2 hours of music from 6:30-8:30. There are a few reserve spots available, and walk-ins are encouraged!!! Drink specials will be announced the week of the event. This event is for ALL SKILL LEVELS. It's an inclusive space welcoming all!

To snag a reserve spot, please email vibe@zinyogawine.com.

About the host:

Kate Bopp is a singer/songwriter based in Raleigh, NC. She has a unique voice and songwriting style, and she believes that everyone has an inner light that shines. Her band Ghost Rattle plays at Zin and other spots around North Carolina.

View Event ‚Üí

Live Music with Jeff Cosco

Our awesome and super talented friend is baaaaack! We are so excited to welcome back Jeff Cosco!

About the performer:

With an impressive career spanning four decades, Jeff is an award-winning singer-songwriter hailing originally from the Finger Lakes region of New York. Along with a discography of six albums that have stood the test of time, Jeff is back with brand new singles being released! Jeff's acoustic shows are a treat for the senses with a perfect blend of his own music and beloved classics.

Round #2 Wine dinner with Chef Luis Zouain

üç∑üçΩ Exciting News! üçΩüç∑

We are beyond honored that Chef Luis Zouain is back again to show off his culinary magic. This time a pinchos night (food on skewers) and almost everything will be served hot. Chef Luis will make this experience unique as we get to interact with him while he is preparing our dishes. Truly a fun wine dinner experience.

Limited space! Book your spot now!

Contact us for any food allergies no later than one week prior to the dinner.

Live Music with Moonlight Songwriters: Featuring Ellie Manfreda

The next installment of our Moonlight Songwriters Series!

About the performer:

Ellie Manfreda is a singer/songwriter, born and raised in Wake Forest, NC. She performs a wide variety of cover songs in genres such as rock, pop, country, and folk and writes originals with a pop flair. She is currently earning two B.A.‚Äôs in Theatre Performance and Music Technology at UNC-Wilmington. You may have recently seen her at Compass Rose Brewery, Hero‚Äôs Pub, The Taproom, or even in Wake Forest High School‚Äôs 2023 production of The Sound of Music as Maria. She has studied under instructors such as Jodi Lewis, Carrie Marshall, and Carrie Banfi. Want to know more about Ellie? Connect with her on all social media platforms @ellie_manfreda.

Live Music with Moonlight Songwriters: Emma Fornes

EMMA: An established musician in the RDU area, Emma Rae has been classically trained in piano since the age of four and voice since the age of five. She trained at the North Carolina Theatre Conservatory for 10 years, where she performed in 5+ mainstage shows with actors from broadway. Additionally, she completed guitar lessons in high school. Emma began covering and writing songs at age 12. Since then, she has built a following on social media platforms such as TikTok (@musicbyemrae), Instagram (@emmaraemusic), and Youtube (Emma Rae Music). Emma has been scouted over five times for final round, executive producer auditions of national singing television competitions. She has gigged at Theatre Raleigh and at NC State‚Äôs ‚ÄúPackapalooza‚Äù (85,000+ attendees). Additionally, she has performed at open mics around the Raleigh community. Emma has released a single on spotify and is currently working on an E.P.

Free Line Dancing Lessons

Zin Yoga Studio & Wine Lounge invite you to dance with 8 Count Country!

Join us in the breezeway for an evening of dancing.

Grab a cold beer with your friends or a glass of wine for a date night and enjoy a FREE Line Dance lesson with Melody and Doug from 8 Count Country

* Wear comfortable shoes to dance

Live Music with Penny's Bend

Based in Durham and named for the gorgeous nature preserve along the Eno River, Penny's Bend ‚Äì featuring Andrea Cash on vocals and Robbie Raper on acoustic guitar and sometimes mandolin ‚Äì pays tribute to a wide range of popular artists, from Patsy Cline, Prince, Dua Lipa, and Beyonc√© to Whitney Houston, Johnny Cash, Sia, and Madonna.

Links: pennysbend.com AND instagram.com/pennysbend

Live Music with Kyle Mullins

Kyle Mullins plays a wide variety of music ranging across all genres from rock, country, pop and hip hop. Playing the top hits from all decades along with his own original music it‚Äôs a show you don‚Äôt want to miss!

View Event ‚Üí

Live Music with Nick Driver

Nick Driver, the soulful singer-songwriter hailing from the musical landscapes of North Carolina. A laureate of the coveted John Lennon Songwriting Award in 2011, Driver's lyrical prowess shines through hits like "Spare Me Some Change" and "Let's Stay Together," earning him a place on commercial radio and Sirius XM, where his magic unfolds on the Coffeehouse Station. Dive into the tapestry of Driver's musical universe, where over 25 television and film placements attest to the universal resonance of his compositions. From MTV's Real World to E! TV's Kim & Kourt Take Miami, Driver's tunes like "Fragile Hearts" and "Dragon Me Down" have become the sonic backdrop to compelling narratives. Beyond the airwaves, Driver has graced the stages of Floydfest and Warped Tour, sharing amphitheater dates with Donovan Frankenreiter, Huey Lewis and the News, and the Jonas Brothers.

facebook.com/nickdriverband

View Event ‚Üí

Open Mic featuring guest host Don Johnson!!

An extra special edition of Zin‚Äôs open mic, hosted by Garner local and town firefighter (our friend) Don Johnson. :) Dust off your instrument and come on out for your time to shine! About the event: 2 hours of music from 6:30-8:30. Drink specials will be announced the day of the event. This event is for ALL SKILL LEVELS. It's an inclusive space welcoming all! Musicians, singers, actors, dance, standup, poetry, spoken word, performance art‚Ä¶ if you can fit your performance in a small space (and you aren‚Äôt abusing anyone), then your art is welcome here!

Live Music with Barndance

Returning to the time when the giants of country music walked the earth, Barn Dance plays the classics from Bakersfield to Nashville with stops at every hayride and jamboree in between. A Barn Dance set offers treasures from Ray Price, the Louvins, Buck, Merle, Hank, and many more. Featuring expert fiddling, dynamic lead guitar, and on-the-money vocals, the band delivers with genuine authenticity born of their earliest musical memories. Barndance keeps the honky tonk train moving on. The double stops, shuffle beats, and B-bender licks are packed and ready to go.

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/barndance22/

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Barndance22

View Event ‚Üí

Kundalini Yoga and Sound Meditation

Join Amanda May for a Kundalini yoga workshop and sound meditation with the gong. You'll receive a brief background on Kundalini yoga, and then have the chance to experience it yourself. Kundalini yoga is unique and powerful; the practice will lift your energy, and leave you feeling peaceful and rejuvenated.

This course is open to all levels of fitness.

View Event ‚Üí

Storytellers in the Studio starring Jenn Bostic

Jenn Bostic is a soulful singer/songwriter with a hint of pop, blues and gospel. Her emotive songwriting and powerful vocals have been touching hearts around the world. She has had a year of accolades, including having the United States Army Band cover her UK #1 song "Jealous of the Angels," which was also played on Sirius XMs The Pulse and other mainstream ACs reaching that formats Top 40.

Bostic has performed sold out tours across the United States and Europe, including performances on the stages of The Grand Ole Opry, The Ryman Auditorium, and Lincoln Center, as well as BBC Breakfast, BBC Songs of Praise, Daystar, and TBN. As an independent artist, Bostic was the first international artist to have her first three singles playlisted on BBC Radio 2. She was twice named ‚ÄúInternational Touring Artist of the Year,‚Äù by the British Country Music Association. (‚Äò17/‚Äô18).

In 2012 Jenn Bostic received 5 Independent Country Music Association Awards including, ‚ÄúBest Songwriter,‚Äù ‚ÄúBest Musician,‚Äù and ‚ÄúOverall Winner.‚Äù

View Event ‚Üí

Ros√© & Porch Pounder Summer Wine Festival

Get ready to find all your favorites for this summer at our Ros√© and Porch Pounder Festival!

Saturday, June 1, 2022 from 2:00 to 4:00pm

Multiple wine vendors will be sampling amazing finds for your summer imbibing pleasure: ros√©s, whites, and summer reds.

We'll have special purchase discounts on all bottle orders this day, food trucks, and lots of fun!!!

$15/person in advance $20 at the door

* Must be 21 years of age or older to consume or purchase wine

* Be prepared to show ID at pass pickup

* Rain or Shine event

* No refunds for special events

View Event ‚Üí

The Cover Society

The Cover Society are a 3 piece Blues and Rock cover band from Fayetteville, NC. Rachel Waters (originally from Boston, MA) is on Vocals and percussion, Denis Leone (originally from Queens/Brooklyn, NY) on Guitar and Vocals and Tim Tew (Fayetteville, NC native) on Bass Guitar. The band formed in 2023 with a vast collection of popular Blues and Rock songs from many of the greats! We aim to entertain, get your toes tapping and be the musical highlight of your week! Our influences range from blues and bluegrass legends to Rock n Roll icons of yesterday and today with a mix of pop. Come check out The Cover Society coming soon to a venue near you!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=61552705722444&mibextid=ibOpuV

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thecoversocietybandnc?igsh=bTdhMHR0dnlqbGlv&utm_source=qr

YouTube: https://youtu.be/TVTCTH2ghUA?si=AIn2bHGLe-J4U-eW

Retro Mojo

Our good friends Retro Mojo are BACK!!!!!!!!! They always bring an arsenal of good time covers that make us dance and sing along!!!!

About the band:

Retro Mojo has been performing in the Triangle for 10 years. The band features Allan Johnson on guitar, Karl Gyorfy on bass, and Chuck Olexik on drums. Songs covered include a wide variety of musical genres so there will be something for everyone. Save the date and grab your mojo and come on out and join us! Check them out on Facebook at Retro Mojo!

Local draft beer, delicious wines and food truck on site

Pressed Flower Art

Come join us for a fun Pressed Flower Workshop where you can learn how to create beautiful art with dried flowers!

Make your own terrarium with Garden and Gather

Enjoy the warm and welcoming atmosphere at Zin Yoga Studio and Wine Lounge while creating your very own terrarium in a unique recycled wine bottle!This class will teach you everything you need to know about some of my favorite little terrarium plants as well as how to create a miniature ecosystem to best suit their needs! Each ticket will cover one terrarium, and all supplies and materials will be included!

Live Music with Justin Heter Pan

2 hours of live outdoor music under the covered breezeway! Featuring Justin Heter Pan, straight from Never Neverland.

He‚Äôs performing for us right here at the wine lounge! You‚Äôve heard him drum while folks are doing yoga in the studio. Now its time to listen to Justin Heter Pan play some groovy funky music out on the covered patio!

One-man-band style original jam music + covers of The Grateful Dead, Paul Simon, Red Hot Chili Peppers, Stick Figure, Sublime, Xavier Rudd, John Butler Trio, Phish, Talking Heads, Pink Floyd and more!
